GSD.product_version: versions from v5.6 to before v5.10.130
GSD.description:
netfilter: nft_set_pipapo: release elements in clone from abort path

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.130 by commit 4a6430b99f67842617c7208ca55a411e903ba03a, it was introduced in version v5.6 by commit 3c4287f62044a90e73a561aa05fc46e62da173da. For more details please see the references link.
